attributes.action: Citizens Band Radio - legalise SSB inline with the CEPT agreement
attributes.additional_details: To date, Ofcom have failed to agree to legalising SSB on the UK Citizens Band Radio service even though it is signed up to a CEPT agreement. SSB (with a PEP of 12 Watts) has been made legal in the majority of other European Countries who are signed up to the CEPT agreement.
